channel.title: C.I. on encelo.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in C.I. on encelo.github.io

item.title: nCine Dev Update 18
item.description: After a very long time without an update, here comes a new one. It is filled with all the work done in the last six months. 💪

item.title: nCine Dev Update 16
item.description: If you follow the project on GitHub you might have noticed a big development slowdown during the summer. I blame it on a combination of excessive heat and fatigue that led to a general lack of motivation and perseverance. ☀️

item.title: nCine Dev Update 10
item.description:
I’m sure many of you have heard it already: the nCine source code has been released on GitHub!

This means that lately most of the time was dedicated to publication related tasks, for example updates to the site like the addition of a “why nCine?” page and a gallery.
